1.text: Fill an opaque spray bottle with 1 cup (240 mL) of 3% hydrogen peroxide.

2.text: Add 2 cups (470 mL) of water to the bottle.
2.vid: /9/92/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Pour in 1⁄4 cup (59 mL) of lemon juice and shake the bottle.
3.vid: /6/6d/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Shake the solution and use it on porcelain, hardwood, and granite surfaces.
4.vid: /f/f1/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Store hydrogen peroxide cleaner upright for up to 6 months.

6.text: Pour 3⁄4 cup (180 mL) of hot water into a spray bottle.
6.vid: /c/ce/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Stir 1⁄4 cup (59 mL) of powdered laundry detergent into the water.
7.vid: /d/d1/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Add 1 tablespoon (15 grams) of sodium borate to the bottle and stir.
8.vid: /0/0d/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Mix in 1⁄4 cup (59 mL) of pine cleaning oil.
9.vid: /7/7c/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Store the spray bottle in a cool place out of reach of children and pets.

11.text: Fill a spray bottle halfway full with white vinegar.

12.text: Fill the rest of the bottle with plain water.
12.vid: /4/43/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Add fresh citrus rind or essential oils for scent if desired.

14.text: Shake the bottle before using it each time.

15.text: Store the bottle out of reach from children and pets for up to 2 years.

16.text: Fill a 32 fluid ounces (950 mL) spray bottle with 3.5 cups (830 mL) of water.
16.vid: /7/74/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 16.360p.mp4

17.text: Protect your mouth, hands, and eyes before opening ammonia.

18.text: Place the spray bottle in the sink and add 1⁄8 cup (30 mL) of sudsy ammonia.
18.vid: /1/14/Make Your Own Multi Purpose Cleaner Step 18.360p.mp4

19.text: Shake the bottle and use it on ovens, stoves, glass, concrete, and grills.

20.text: Store ammonia-based cleaner in a cupboard away from heat, children, and pets.
